ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the Market Unit picklist value matches the record currency. - DKK → DFJ_DK - SEK → FA_SE - EUR → Ireland
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode, "DKK"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Market_Unit__c, "DFJ_DK")) ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode, "SEK"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Market_Unit__c, "FA_SE")) ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode, "EUR"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Market_Unit__c, "Ireland")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Market Unit must match Currency: - DKK → Din Familie Jurist - SEK → dinfamiljejurist.nu - EUR → Ireland
